snippet: The New York folk painter Ralph Fasanella and the Dutch outsider artist Willem van Genk have thrilling, complementary shows at the American Folk Art Museum.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibits Willem van Genk: Mind Traffic and Ralph Fasanella: Lest We Forget at American Folk Art Museum.
lead_paragraph: The New York folk painter Ralph Fasanella and the Dutch outsider artist Willem van Genk have thrilling, complementary shows at the American Folk Art Museum.

headline.seo: ‘Willem van Genk: Mind Traffic’ and ‘Ralph Fasanella: Lest We Forget’
